Quote.Speaker: Delivery Guy
Quote.Text: I got a delivery for ya'.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Leave it at reception.

Quote.Speaker: Delivery
Quote.Text: I'm supposed to deliver this one in person. [pulls out a gun and starts shooting at Michael, who dodges dramatically]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [pulls out two handguns and kills the man with an unnecessarily large amount of bullets] Clean up on aisle five. [Threat Level:

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: After three years of writing, one year of shooting, four years of re-shooting and two years of editing, I have finally completed my movie, Threat Level:

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Erin... what are you doing?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Guys! Guys. Did you guys know that our own Michael Scott has made a movie, and that he maybe will let us watch it, but only if everybody's dying to see it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That's... That's. Well, don't put words in my mouth.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Threat Level:

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: We'd love to see it!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Sweet, I will go invite Holly.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay everyone, I know we're really excited to see this movie that everybody's in, but we have to remember that Michael is sensitive, so let's stay positive! And no laughing, no comments, just positive energy and we'll have a pure fun day! Okay?

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Thanks mom.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: You never told me you made a movie.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Mhmm! It's got action, it's got heart, it's got some bosom.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: It's got you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It's got a lot of me.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [laughs] I can't wait.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ladies and gentleman, Threat Level:

Quote.Speaker: Narrator
Quote.Text: [Stanley's voice as the screen shows Scarn Manor] Michael Scarn, well that's an interesting story. [headlines of Michael Scarn's success are shown as well as an article reporting the death of Michael's wife, Catherine Zeta Scarn] He was once the best secret agent in the business. That was years ago. Where is he now? Well, that's also an interesting story.

Quote.Speaker: Samuel
Quote.Text: [Dwight Schrute dressed as a butler. Speaks in slow, deep voice] Master Scarn.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I play Samuel, Michael Scarn's robot butler. I wanted Samuel's voice- [robot impression] to be like this! [normally] But Michael thought that Samuel should be a very advance android, almost indistinguishable from a real person.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Dwight does not play a robot.

Quote.Speaker: Samuel
Quote.Text: [crashes cymbals by Michael's ear]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [lying on bed with a bottle of alcohol] I'm up.

Quote.Speaker: Samuel
Quote.Text: It's the president. He needs you for a mission.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Tell him I'm retired.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: It's Goldenface.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Goldenface, this makes it personal.

Quote.Speaker: President
Quote.Text: [Darryl, sitting at a desk in the Oval Office] Scarn, you're right on time. [cheering from the office]

Quote.Speaker: Daryl
Quote.Text: I gave up a lot of weekends because I thought it'd be good for my daughter to see a black man as president. Even in a silly home movie. What a stupid waste of time.

Quote.Speaker: President
Quote.Text: It's your old enemy, Goldenface. He's after the NHL All Star Game. He's hidden a bomb somewhere in the stadium. Scarn, this one is personal for me. I own the stadium. I can't see it blown up. It's my retirement plan.

Quote.Speaker: Samuel
Quote.Text: We have to search the stadium.

Quote.Speaker: President
Quote.Text: Not so fast, Goldenface has taken all the concession stand workers hostage. Scarn, will you find these hostages, and save the game?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [holding a quarter up] Heads I do it, tails I don't. Best out of seven. [flips the coin] Heads. [flips it again] Tails. [President winces each time he says tails]...Heads...Tails...Heads...Tails. [flips one more time and the quarter spins around on the table. Michael looks at it] Well, it looks like there's going to be a clean-up on aisle five.

Quote.Speaker: Narrator
Quote.Text: Well, the hostages were scared.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [as a hostage] Don't you guys get it? Nobody's coming for us.

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: [Jim, with his face painted with metallic gold paint] Oh someone's coming alright, the only man who would care. [Goldenface turns in his chair, holding a golden gun] Michael Scarn. See I'm gonna lure him here, then I kill everybody, then... I'm gonna dig up Scarn's dead wife, and I'm gonna hump her real good. [malicious, deep laughter]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I did not love the dialogue. Or the character. I took the role to impress a receptionist who will remain nameless.

Quote.Speaker: Narrator
Quote.Text: [scene shows Michael Scarn driving through the rain] Well, the All Star Game was three days away, so naturally it was all sold out. The only way Scarn was getting in was in a uniform. Just one problem with that, Scarn didn't know a hockey stick from a Slim Jim. So he went to meet with the famed trainer... [Michael stops the car and gets out] Cherokee Jack.

Quote.Speaker: Cherokee Jack
Quote.Text: [Creed wearing a tunic and carrying a mop, standing with Michael in front of an ice rink] Mop the ice.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm not here to learn how to mop, I'm here to learn how to play hockey.

Quote.Speaker: Cherokee Jack
Quote.Text: Mop it. [A montage of Michael mopping the ice awkwardly and using an ab-cruncher, and slowly getting better. After a little while, Cherokee Jack Slams a hockey stick on the ice to stop Michael, then offers it to him] Now take this.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What am I supposed to do with this?

Quote.Speaker: Cherokee Jack
Quote.Text: Mop. [a montage shows Michael sliding around the ice skillfully and hitting the puck into the goal]

Quote.Speaker: Narrator
Quote.Text: Well, Michael Scarn was quickly becoming one of the hottest hockey players in the country.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: [Ryan is acting as an official for the competition taking place. A line is formed in front of a line on the ice. Standing behind it are Michael Scarn, Oscar in a blue full-body suit, and a mysterious man in a hockey mask] Each year, the National Hockey League selects one civilian amateur to play in the All Star Game. It's down to the three of you. The final test is speed skating. [holds a gun to the ceiling] On your marks, get set...

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: Die! [The masked man pulls off the mask to reveal that it is Goldenface]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [Michael and Goldenface skate around the rink, Goldenface shooting with a solid gold gun, Michael with two pistols. Michael is out of breath at the end of the race] Nice try Goldenface, but you forgot one thing, to kill me.

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: I wasn't trying to kill you, I was trying to slow you down. [Ryan is seen placing a medal around Oscar's neck]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No!

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: Oh by the way!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah?

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: How's your wife doing?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [begins to cry as Goldenface laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Congratulations.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Hey, you came in second. Not bad either.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I am sorry that I have to do this... [starts choking Oscar to death with his towel]

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Huh...[muffled screaming as he slowly chokes, and eventually dies]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry.

Quote.Speaker: Samuel
Quote.Text: I'm intercepting a name. Jasmine Winsong. She works for Goldenface. What I can't figure out is, who is the Funky Cat.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Not who, what. The Funky Cat is the hippest Jazz Club in town. [stands up with his cup of tea and walks by Samuel, pouring his tea all over him]

Quote.Speaker: Samuel
Quote.Text: Oh-[starts to freak out, but the scene is crudely cut short]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: He cut the part where my circuit board malfunctioned! What was the point of spilling the drink on me?

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: [acting as a jazz singer at the Funky Cat, singing] They call me Jasmine Winsong.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [walking into the Funky Cat] Bingo.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: He finished his movie? [frantically trying to open her car door, as if trying to get away from the camera crew] No kidding. Wow, that's great. Yeah that's good for him.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: [singing gibberish while laying on the piano on stage]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [pulls out a recording device from his pocket and clicks it on]

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: [michael pushes the backwards button on the recorder] The hostages are under the stadium. [An assassin with a golden tie shoots her with a tranquilizer and she falls]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Jack Blaise.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You have to let us go Goldenface! We have families!

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: Ha! This is gonna show them [cocks his golden gun] that I mean business. See ya! [points gun to Toby the hostage's head, shoots and Toby's fake head explodes, the shot is shown repeatedly]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: By far and away, the most expensive shot in the movie. But, it was integral to the story.

Quote.Speaker: Samuel
Quote.Text: Ha! [kicking open the gate in the stadium where the hostages and Goldenface are]

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Michael Scarn!

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: Sorry about your friend, Scarn!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: The joke's on you Goldenface, that man was a wanted animal rapist.

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: [gives Michael a disgusted look]

Quote.Speaker: Samuel
Quote.Text: We've searched the whole building, Goldenface, where is the bomb?

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: Hm?

Quote.Speaker: Samuel
Quote.Text: We've searched the whole building, Goldenface, where is the bomb?

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: Hm?

Quote.Speaker: Samuel
Quote.Text: We've searched the wh- ok...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: He said, where is the bomb?

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: In the puck! [tosses the puck to Michael]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Why are you telling me this?

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: Because I'm going to kill you. [takes out golden gun] Unless! You forgive me for murdering your wife. [distraught, memories of him and his wife are shown on the puck in a dreamy haze]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hey Goldenface.

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: Yeah?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Go puck yourself!

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: [dodges the puck and shoots at Michael]

Quote.Speaker: Samuel
Quote.Text: Noooo! [jumps in front of Michael to receive the bullet]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That was not scripted.

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: [re-cocks gun and shoots at Michael, who looks shocked and scared]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: More Tylenol.

Quote.Speaker: Helene
Quote.Text: [as a busty nurse] You've already had four.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Looking at her mother on screen, horrified] Oh God... [looks at Michael] So good.

Quote.Speaker: Helene
Quote.Text: You're lucky to be alive.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It'll take a lot more than a bullet to the brain, lungs, heart, back, and balls to kill Michael Scarn.

Quote.Speaker: Helene
Quote.Text: Let's just make sure that everything's... Working properly... [leans in closer to Michael and the heart rate monitor, which was beating steadily, now beats very quickly]

Quote.Speaker: President
Quote.Text: You just said the bomb... is in the puck?

Quote.Speaker: Michael and Samuel together
Quote.Text: Yes.

Quote.Speaker: President
Quote.Text: Is that where you hid the bomb Goldenface?

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: [walks into the Oval Office with an accomplice, Troy]

Quote.Speaker: Samuel
Quote.Text: But why would you blow up the stadium? You OWN the stadium!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: For the insurance money! I knew it all along! [the President, Goldenface, and his minion pull out automatic machine guns] You will never get away with this! [takes a painting of Abraham Lincoln and awkwardly smashes it on the President's head, runs out of the office as Goldenface and his minion shoot at them]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Where had I gone wrong? All I wanted was to start a family with my beautiful wife. But somewhere along the way, things got messed up.

Quote.Speaker: Narrator
Quote.Text: It wasn't easy for Scarn to admit that he had lost his self-confidence. And he hadn't of course, He just wasn't using it right now.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [in a bar] Beer me Billy.

Quote.Speaker: Billy
Quote.Text: [Andy as a bar tender with a Brooklyn accent] You don't looks so good, what's got ya down?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I got problems Billy. Big problems...

Quote.Speaker: Billy
Quote.Text: You got problems?! My TV don't work! I pay thirty bucks a month for the damn satellite what's-a-whosit, I can't even get the damn game! Now you tell me, what's worse than that?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [laughs to himself] Don't ever change Billy. Goldenface is going to blow up the NHL All Star Game tomorrow.

Quote.Speaker: Billy
Quote.Text: I see what you mean about problems. I know what'll cheer you up. That table of bachelorettes over there bought you this drink. [a table with Meredith, Phyllis, Karen, and Angela all say hey to Michael]

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: Ever banged an entire bachelorette party, baby? [winks]

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: Why are you singling my line out, like, a million years later?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm too depressed to save the big game Billy.

Quote.Speaker: Billy
Quote.Text: I'm gonna cheer you up, the only ways I know hows. [to a small boy in overalls] Hey kid! Hit G-9 on the Jukebox!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No Billy, I haven't done that dance since my wife died.

Quote.Speaker: Billy
Quote.Text: There is a whole crowd of people out there, who need to learn, how to do The Scarn.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [A funky beat sounds from the Jukebox and Michael starts dancing poorly] Well my name's Michael Scarn and I'm here to say, I'm about to do The Scarn in a major way. [the bachelorettes and the others in the bar stand up to join him] You jump to the right and you shake a hand and you jump to the left and you shake that hand. You meet new friends, and tie that yarn, and that's how you do The Scarn! [doing the actions he says to] You jump to the right and you shake a hand and you jump to the left and you shake that hand. You meet new friends, and tie that yarn, and that's how you do The Scarn! You jump to the right and you shake a hand and you jump to the left and you shake that hand. You meet new friends, and tie that yarn, and that's how you do The Scarn!

Quote.Speaker: Todd Packer
Quote.Text: [as a drunken man in the bar] If doing The Scarn is gay, then I'm the biggest queer on Earth!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [cracking up at the stupidity of it, the rest of the office besides Michael and Holly are concealing their laughter. Pam Is trying to quiet Jim up] Sorry.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [turns off the movie from the remote, the office complains]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I'm sorry, I'm really, really sorry. I think I was just relieved, to see that Michael Scarn got his confidence back.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Yeah Michael the movie is amazing!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: It's like one of the best movies I've ever seen in my life.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: You should enter it in festivals!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Or carnivals!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [to Holly] Well that's a... pretty good reaction. [Holly nods] Pretty cool, right? Did you like it? Did you like that?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Uh... which part?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay. [Stands up and leaves the conference room to the dismay of the office] No, it's not good enough. It's not good enough...

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Some people are really popping on screen!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Hey! Good movie.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Mmmm, good? Everybody out there says it's great!

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I loved it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Did you? What did you love about it?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Uhm, I loved that you got to work together with all your friends. Isn't that great when you can all work together like that?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, no. Holly, this isn't Ocean's Eleven, where you get together with all your friends and just have fun and don't care about how it turns out. What'd you really think, honestly.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Uhm...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Is it, is it because you're afraid of where this is gonna take me? See, because I need you... to keep me grounded.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Not worried about that.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [angrily] It was eleven years, okay? This has been my dream for eleven years, and if you don't think it's great than you're basically saying that you don't believe in my dream.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Wha- It's your dream and you never even mentioned it before!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I talk about a lot of things, Holly! I was eventually gonna get around to my dream! Obviously! Eleven years I could've been working on the Scarn Nebulus.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Well why do you have to make a movie at all?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Because, if I don't have this, what do I have? I have nothing.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Really, you can't think of anything else that you might have?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I have my book on business, Somehow I Manage. I have my HBO comedy special, Here I Go Again dot-dot-dot. But you know what? When I think about it, when I really think about it, none of those things are as real to me as my movie.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I'm real.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah, you're a real pain in the ass. And I'm gonna go watch the movie with people who think it's great! And I'm sorry I called you a pain in the ass, I'm angry, and I love you.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I love you too.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I am a huge Woody Allen fan. Although I've only seen Antz, but I'll tell you something. What I respect about that man, is that when he was going through all that stuff that came out in the press, about how Antz was just a rip-off of A Bug's Life, he stayed true to his films. Or at least the film that I saw which again was Antz. The thing is... I thought Bug's Life was better, much better. Than Ants. The point is, don't listen to your critics, listen to your fans.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Who likes Threat Level:

Quote.Speaker: Samuel
Quote.Text: Michael! You have to get to that puck before halftime! Or the whole stadium will explode!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I know, it's a good thing my trainer and mentor is here to cheer me on!

Quote.Speaker: Samuel
Quote.Text: Cherokee Jack? Michael he died.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [crying] This one's for you Cherokee Jack. [Michael skates into the rink of an already in-play match]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: We filmed this during an actual Scranton High School Hockey Game, trying to qualify for states.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [he office shushes Michael to hear the movie better] That's fine, it's great!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, no! Actually it's really screwed up because they [chuckles], they were trying to qualify, they were disqualified, they had to forfeit the game. Undefeated season. That's why there were so many people there. [Michael stands up, clearly realizing that his movie is not as great as he thought]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Why is your face gold?

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: Why do you care?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I'm just making conversation.

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: I worked in a gold factory, we had a boss, who only cared about money...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hey...

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Hey, I'm sorry. It is good.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No it's not. [kisses Holly while smiling] It's not. But, they really seem to be enjoying it.

Quote.Speaker: Hostage
Quote.Text: Please Goldenface, let us go!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [ees Cherokee Jack from a confusion of heavenly light and smoke] Cherokee Jack.

Quote.Speaker: Cherokee Jack
Quote.Text: I want you to take all of your frustrations, with women, the system, with everything. Take it out on the puck. All on the puck.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [laughs at the stupidity]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [skates forward, hits the puck, and stares in wonder as it flies by]

Quote.Speaker: Samuel
Quote.Text: Yah! [kicks open the gate to save the hostages, hostages rejoice as Samuel unties them] [the puck is seen flying into space and it hits a satellite, Billy is at his bar and his TV suddenly turns back on]

Quote.Speaker: Billy
Quote.Text: Hey! We got sports games again! [people at the bar cheer]

Quote.Speaker: Goldenface
Quote.Text: [seen at his house counting his money] Ha ha ha! Ha ha ha ha ha! [The puck lands on his lap] Oh-[A large explosion blocks out his words] [The office cheers at the ending of the movie, Michael Scarn holds up a trophy]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [in Scarn manor] Some breakfast for me [shows a plate of bacon and eggs] and some breakfast for you. [pulls out an oil can and oils Samuel's circuit board on his back]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh yeah, I guess I did let him be a robot.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [phone rings] I'll get it! Man I love being retired! Scarn here!

Quote.Speaker: President
Quote.Text: [on phone] Michael, it's the president.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hello sir.

Quote.Speaker: President
Quote.Text: I need you for another mission.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ugh... [after a little thought] I'm in.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [the office cheers] Whoa Whoa Whoa! Isn't the president evil?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh yeah! [laughs] Yes he is!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No no, he's doing it to catch the president!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, no Dwight. He's just being stupid. [the office laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Narrator
Quote.Text: [in Stanley's voice, a chair is shown with a gray haired head sticking above it] Well, Michael Scarn was back in the game. And I bet you're wondering why do I know so much about Michael Scarn. [the chair revolves to show Michael Scarn, gray haired, talking with Stanley's voice] Well because I AM Michael Scarn. [applause]

Quote.Speaker: Rapper
Quote.Text: [Andy rapping to a montage of scenes from the movie] Ahhhh, yeah! Threat Level Midnight! Makes all the girlies feel alright! From Madonna to Madelyn Allbrite, Threat Level Midnight! It's a threat, a level, a level level threat. He's the greatest hockey-star I ever seen yet. Threat Level what? Midnight! Threat Level who? Michael Scarn! Threat Level why? Apartheid! Gotta fight it, Free Mandela! Peace I'm out!
